original: 《 行商 》　　　有言商者深入險地、趨利而行。　　　行商偶爾會帶來數年一遇的稀有商品；　　　每有商人造訪時，記得前往購買相關商品！
text: "Businessman" 　　　 There are businessmen who go deep into dangerous places and seek profit.　　　 merchants occasionally bring rare products that are once in a few years; 　　　 every time a merchant visits, remember to buy related products!
